data.name: RoFIsh: Prelude
data.detailed_description:
RoFIsh: Prelude is a first person adventure about a cat named Stas,        
                                         trying to escape an island after a shipwreck.
                                        Throughout the game you will get to witness
                       a deliberately clawchéd plot, absurd dialogs and drunkard crabs.

                                                     

               Upon waking up Stas faces the fact that his ship is broken and he has to fix it.
                      But where would he get supplies and tools on an uninhabited island?          
                                                           Stas sure is lucky!
                  Because after the virulent storm the sea dwellers have acquired sentience
                            and are ready to help….for something in return, of course =)
                                                                                                                                         
                              Help the natives, complete mini-games and solve puzzles.
                Stas is a fisherman and his fishing rod will help him solve a lot of problems =)
                         Upgrade it, collect bait and use it to catch an assortment of fish
                                                  and other inhabitants of the sea.
                     But be very observant, some of them require a different approach :)

                                                     

                             - A warm and welcoming tropical island (about +30 С°)
                                             - Pleasant voxel graphics (we hope:)                                    
                                           - Small mini-games (like, really tiny)
                                     - Mini-games (almost the same as small ones)
                                           - Big mini-games (like, freaking HUGE)                                           
                                      - Deep plot (not a Mariana Trench, but close)
                                                 - Satire (jokes out the wazoo)
                            - Memorable characters (well, I don’t think I forgot anyone)             
                      - Memes, references and reminiscences (a big, smart word, google it)
                                                  - You can play as a cat (=^･^=)

data.short_description: RoFIsh: Prelude - a surprising mix of a twisted adventure and a fishing game, where you can play cards with crabs or catch a fish Dominic Toretto. Befriend the locals, catch yourself some helping hands and get off the mysterious Crab Island =)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 2100
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650, HD 7750
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 8100
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Strong Language, Use of Alcohol, Cartoon violence
